description_expanded: WANLISELL Buffalo Plaid Washable Area Rug (4'x5') is designed to deliver everyday reliability with thoughtful details suited for home decor. A black and white buffalo check plaid area rug. Non-slip backing and washable surface make it perfect for kitchens, bedrooms, or living rooms. Built for convenience and value, it balances quality materials with practical features you can rely on at home, on the go, or as a thoughtful gift.
